meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tony Barreto Steve Lipman Fern Cogar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #459.

td.p: Tony Barreto, a deputy district attorney originally from New Bedford, Massachusetts
Steve Lipman, a teacher from Fullerton, California
Fern Cogar, a registered nurse from Pasadena, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,900)

tr.td: THE NAVY
SWEETS
"LITTLE" SONGS
BEAR FACTS
MOUNTAINS

(Alex: And what that means, of course, is that in your response, you'll be expected to put a word in front of "the", and a word after it. For example, if we said, "A film about the destruction of a World War II German battleship", you would say "What is Sink the Bismarck!?")

tr.td: Fern
Steve
Tony

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Fern
Steve
Tony
BROADCAST POLITICS
NOTORIOUS
LATIN
SPORTS STADIUMS
ASTROLOGY
